name: Eternal Nomads
description:
Eternal Nomads is my entry for the 2020 Lux Jam, with the theme "Light and Shadow".

The dark side of the planet you are colonizing is lethal. Everything you build will eventually be lost into the night. Keep building in the daylight, and survive as long as you can.

The game was created in  Godot, and source is available at https://gitlab.com/rcorre/eternal-nomads under the MIT License.

All models were created using Blender

The music was created in LMMS

Sounds were generated in Audacity

Icons were created in Inkscape

I used the Orbitron Font (OFL Licensed) from the League of Moveable Type.

I release all assets aside from the font (which is not mine) and the code (which is MIT-licensed) under CC-BY-SA-4.0.

Dev streams can be found at https://www.twitch.tv/ryan_rcorre/videos.
